subject: docs(all): update documentation to reflect current architecture
body:
README was a placeholder with just "# graphiki". Now includes project
overview, features, tech stack, getting started, project structure,
data model, configuration, and license.

Discovery doc had stale references to tab-based navigation, split-panel
layout, editable conventions page, ConventionRules interface, and
AppState type â€” all artifacts of the pre-realignment architecture.
Updated to reflect single-view layout with drawer overlay, read-only
conventions modal, and removed obsolete type definitions.

CLAUDE.md docs tree was missing markdown-import-format.md and
ai-research-output-guide.md. Also listed historical working docs.
Fixed JSON export version reference from "1" to "2".

Markdown import format doc referenced schema-based type resolution.
Updated to reflect label-based system where tags/type/labels frontmatter
fields all become labels.

Added SUPERSEDED/COMPLETED status banners to all 6 historical working
docs (phase-2 through phase-6, mode-differentiation-alignment).

Tags: docs, readme, discovery, conventions, architecture
Complexity: 3
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: documentation
Semver: patch

title: update documentation to reflect current architecture
